body:
I was attempting to create a local build cache from a directory, and I found the docs for both buildcaches and mirrors, but did not connect the docs that the url variable could be the local filesystem variable. I am extending the docs for buildcaches with an example of creating and interacting with one on the filesystem because I suspect other users will run into this need and possibly not find what they are looking for.

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: extending example for buildcaches
